articles.description: Fans are encouraged to vote through the weekend
articles.content:
GREEN BAY Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers has been nominated for the FedEx Air Player of the Year.
Fans are encouraged to vote for Rodgers here, on Twitter via the @NFL published polls and on the … [+839 chars]
